Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1967...
Injured on 6/19/1967 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/14/1970 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1971, off Bill Graham (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/1971, off Jack Billingham (ATL)...
Injured on 7/19/1971 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/28/1973...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/4/1977 to a 5-year deal worth $14,444,445 per year...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Philadelphia on 8/4/1977...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Philadelphia on 8/4/1977...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 4/13/1978...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1978, hitting .330 with 5 HR, 22 RBI...
Injured on 6/21/1979 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/19/1979...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Philadelphia on 9/24/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1979, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 14 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against New York (N) on 10/2/1979...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 10/2/1979...
Won MVP Award in 1979, hitting .256 with 26 HR, 121 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 1/31/1981 (Going to NYM: P R. Gossage, P R. Jarvis, 1B C. Fisk, 2B S. Braun. Going to CHC: P D. Stieb)...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 8/14/1981...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1981...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 9/15/1982...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1982...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 7/7/1983 (Going to CHC: 1B C. Fisk. Going to NYM: 2B J. Remy)...
